alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 12:53PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Walton, southwestern Holmes and central Washington Counties through 1230 PM CDT... At 1152 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of Vernon, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Bonifay, De Funiak Springs, Live Oak, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Westville, Hinsons Crossroads, Red Bay, Douglass Crossroad, Whitehead Crossroads, Eucheeanna, Holmes Valley, Millers Ferry, Five Points, Hulaw, Knox Hill, Smyrna, Argyle and Sylvania. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton; Washington
